related-activity.ref: 0510/A0/05/401 OCM 1. EVERY CHILD SURVIVES AND THRIVES

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 1.2. Integrated health services' networks in selected departments and municipalities deliver quality and integrated maternal and child health, nutrition and birth registration services in at least two out of four departments receiving UNICEF support.

description.narrative: Within the framework of the Unified Health System, the management and care capacity of the Health Networks was strengthened in the areas of child, maternal and adolescent health. Furthermore, through joint work with the Ministry of Health, the comprehensive approach to child health care was promoted, building the Integrated Early Childhood Development (IECD) Model, as well as differentiated and comprehensive care for adolescents. All actions aimed at improving the quality of care with a gender and rights approach were continued and expanded. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
